techs.name: Thaumaturgy
techs.quote: 'The thaumaturgic art is neither holy nor profane; it is an art of wisdom, demanding purity of heart and mastery over one’s own nature to employ the higher laws of the universe.' - Franz Hartmann

techs.name: Drama and Poetry
techs.quote: 'What is drama but life with the dull bits cut out.' - Alfred Hitchcock

techs.name: Magical Warfare
uniques: [+50]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'Magical warfare is not a clash of swords, but a battle of wills. It is in the precision of thought and the direction of the mind that victory is secured.' - Aleister Crowley

techs.name: Banking
uniques: [+100]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'Happiness: a good bank account, a good cook and a good digestion' - Jean Jacques Rousseau

techs.name: Arcane Studies
uniques: [+50]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'The arcane arts are no mere folly but the means to discover the secrets of God’s creation, for in the symbols of magic lie the laws of nature yet unseen.' - John Dee

techs.name: Economics
uniques: [+50]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'Compound interest is the most powerful force in the universe.' - Albert Einstein

techs.name: Scientific Theory
uniques: [+100]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of imagination.' - John Dewey

techs.name: Industrialization
uniques: [+50]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'Industrialization based on machinery, already referred to as a characteristic of our age, is but one aspect of the revolution that is being wrought by technology.' - Emily Greene Balch

techs.name: Technomancy
uniques: [+100]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.' - Arthur C. Clarke

techs.name: Replaceable Parts
uniques: [+100]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.' - Henry Ford

techs.name: Thaumaturgic Mastery
uniques: [+150]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'The art of Thaumaturgy lies in understanding the invisible virtues of things, for in knowing their properties, man may command the forces of nature to heal or transform.' - Paracelsus

techs.name: Atomic Theory
uniques: [+100]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'The unleashed power of the atom has changed everything save our modes of thinking, and we thus drift toward unparalleled catastrophes.' - Albert Einstein

techs.name: Apotheosis
techs.quote: 'Man is something that shall be overcome. What have you done to overcome him?' - Friedrich Nietzsche

techs.name: Future Tech
techs.quote: 'I think we agree, the past is over.' - George W. Bush

civilopediaText.text: Who knows what the future holds?
